item.title: Spoken vs. Coding Languages
item.description: INTRO As many data scientists and programmers have said, R and Python may be 2 of the most useful languages to know. Similarly, politicians and businessmen say that English and Chinese are the 2 most useful languages to learn. But of course it is difficult to become fluent in both- especially since they are 2 of the most difficult languages both grammar- and vocabulary-wise. This is the same for R and Python.
